properties.Name: Bike Hub
properties.Description: A full-service bicycle repair shop for the PSU community, the PSU Bike Hub sells bicycles, parts and accessories and provides tools, resources, and instruction to promote and support bike commuting to campus. The PSU Bike Hub is also a 'do-it-yourself' environment where we provide the tools, resources, and instruction to enable you to maintain your bike. In 2015, PSU received a Bike Friendly University rating of Platinum from the League of American Bicyclists.
